import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-ver-comando', templateUrl: './ver-comando.component.html', styleUrls: ['./ver-comando.component.css'] }) export class VerComandoComponent { nombreComando = "shutdown" }

{{ nombreComando }}

> shutdown
